item.title: CVE-2017-6150|2024-09-17T00:06:49.713Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20websafe
item.description: Under certain conditions for F5 BIG-IP systems 13.0.0 or 12.1.0 - 12.1.3.1, using FastL4 profiles, when the Reassemble IP Fragments option is disabled (default), some specific large fragmented packets may restart the Traffic Management Microkernel (TMM).
